name: Souvlaki Chicken Kebabs
description: One of our favourites! A delicious, healthy meal made in minutes. Kebabs are a summer staple, and one of Greece’s most popular street foods. It’s the easiest way to get your protein and veggies grilled quickly!

ingredients.name: Chicken Souvlaki Seasoning or Donair Seasoning

preparation:
1. Preheat grill to medium high.
  2. Cut chicken into 1” cubes. In a bowl, combine seasoning and oil. Add chicken; toss to evenly coat.
  3. Cut peppers and onion into 1” cubes.
  4. Thread meat and vegetables onto Grill Boss Skewers.
  5. Place skewers on grill; rotate often until lightly charred and chicken is cooked through, 8–10 min.
  6. Arrange on a large platter.
tips: Let chicken marinate for 15 min before grilling to absorb flavours.
